topics.body:
Well guys, in almost half a month I have gotten thorugh the Thriller Bark arc, the Sabaody Archipelago arc, the Amazon Lily arc, the Impel Down arc, and I have just officially completed the Marineford arc. To put this into perspective the Triller bark arc started on chapter 442 and the Marinford arc ended on chapter 580. In a little less than two weeks I have torn through *138 chapters of One Piece.*
Have I mentioned how much I love One Piece?
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

Wow, Squiggy, you're good. I mean, REALLY good! I couldn't even tear through 138 chapters of a manga in 15 days!
